svg.text: McCzarny recently focused on enhancing
automation and resilience across his
repositories. In chromium-daily-digest, he
introduced automated weekly summaries with new
workflows, configuration updates, and a
dedicated logo. He also improved the summary
generation process by updating custom
instructions, increasing API retries, and
implementing sequential commit processing to
optimize API usage. For ghsummary, a
significant effort was made to address
non-functionality caused by GitHub API changes,
adding a prominent warning to the README. He
further refined ghsummary by using the GitHub
compare API, incorporating a GITHUB_TOKEN for
higher rate limits, and adding exponential
backoff for LLM calls to improve reliability.
He also ensured proper pagination for event
types and refined error handling. In the
upload-image action, McCzarny updated the
cloudinary dependency to 2.8.0 and bumped the
action's version. These updates included new
functions for managing and deleting Cloudinary
resources by asset IDs. Finally, he performed
project cleanup in chromium-daily-digest and
added new images and resized existing ones in
his images repository.
Generated on: Sun Nov 16 01:59:57 2025
